name: Magnesium
description:
Magnesium is a simple game based off of the mechanics of 2048. You slide the board to combine tiles of the same element to create higher elements. This game also contains entertaining information on the elements you discover. Give it a shot and see just how far you can go. 

HOW TO PLAY

  • Download and run the executable.
  • WASD or arrow keys to slide tiles.
